title: The history of the Bible
itunes:title: The history of the Bible
itunes:subtitle: John Barton considers the historical background to the most influential book in western culture, exploring how it fits into the histories of Judaism and Christianity. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Biblical scholar John Barton considers the historical background to the most influential book in western culture, exploring its creation and how it fits into the histories of Judaism and Christianity. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
